attributes.action: Stop Using Animals For Cosmetic Tests
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop using animals for cosmetic tests!
testing an animals for cosmetic things e.g-shampoo or make-up, is cruel and unfair to animals. We should only test on animals for cures for SERIOUS diseases. Also people keep animals in a terrible enviroment and animals are killed after each test.
YOU CAN HELP BY SIGNING THE PETITION! 
SAVE THE ANIMALS!!!!!!!!!!
Please sign the petition- every signature counts!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
